interfaces

Class PokerInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.PokerInterface

  • public class PokerInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the poker interface which can be accessed with interface_name = "PokerInterface" It contains the complete request- and response logic
    Author:
    Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann
    See Also:
    JSONArray, JSONObject, MessagingException, ResultSet, SQLException, Arrays

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public org.json.JSONObject receive(java.lang.String event,
                                   org.json.JSONObject data,
                                   User current_user,
                                   UserList connected_users,
                                   RoomList all_rooms)
                            throws NotLoggedInException,
                                   java.sql.SQLException,
                                   javax.mail.MessagingException
        the entry point of the PokerInterface. Is called by the WebsocketEndpoint and gets all the given information to fire the right event
        Parameters:
        event - the event that needs to be triggered
        data - the data that is needed for the event
        current_user - the current user who is calling the interface
        connected_users - all users who are connected to the server
        all_rooms - all rooms that are created
        Returns:
        returns a JSONObject with the response of the event
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - is thrown if the current_user ist not logged in and is not calling a method where is doesn't need to log in
        java.sql.SQLException - is thrown if there are any SQL Errors
        javax.mail.MessagingException

      • do_bet

        private org.json.JSONObject do_bet(RoomList all_rooms,
                                   org.json.JSONObject data,
                                   User user)
        This method perform a bet if the user is at turn
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - needed to get the game of the room
        data - holds the information about the bet (int) at the key "bet"
        user - the user who wants to perform a bet
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not, 2 bet have to be bigger than 0, 3 bet is to high)

      • do_call

        private org.json.JSONObject do_call(RoomList all_rooms,
                                    User user)
        This method perform a call if the user is at turn
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - needed to get the game of the room
        user - the user who wants to perform a call
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not, 2 user needs more money)

      • do_check

        private org.json.JSONObject do_check(RoomList all_rooms,
                                     User user)
        This method perform a check if the user is at turn
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - needed to get the game of the room
        user - the user who wants to perform a check
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not)

      • do_raise

        private org.json.JSONObject do_raise(RoomList all_rooms,
                                     org.json.JSONObject data,
                                     User user)
        This method perform a raise if the user is at turn
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - needed to get the game of the room
        data - holds the information about the raise (int) at the key "raise"
        user - the user who wants to perform a raise
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not, 2 raise have to be bigger than 0, 3 bet is to high)

      • do_fold

        private org.json.JSONObject do_fold(RoomList all_rooms,
                                    User user)
        This method perform a fold if the user is at turn
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - needed to get the game of the room
        user - the user who wants to perform a fold
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not)

      • isLoggedIn

        private void isLoggedIn(UserList connected_users,
                        User user)
                 throws NotLoggedInException
        checks if the given user is already logged in.
        Parameters:
        connected_users - all user who are already logged_in
        user - the user who needs to be checked if he is logged in
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • login_user

        private org.json.JSONObject login_user(org.json.JSONObject data,
                                       User current_user,
                                       UserList connected_users,
                                       RoomList all_rooms)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        possible event of the PokerInterface. Logs the requesting user in or renews his web session if already logged in
        Parameters:
        data - the data containing all information (need to contain "user" and "password")
        current_user - the requesting user
        connected_users - all connected users
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the response (status: 0 if OK, 1 if not)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • list_rooms

        private org.json.JSONObject list_rooms(RoomList all_rooms)
        possible event of PokerInterface. creates a JSONObject with the details of every room
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - every room that is created
        Returns:
        JSONObject of the detailed room list (e.g. {body: {[room_id: 1, seats: 0], [room_id:2, seats: 1}}

      • create_room

        private org.json.JSONObject create_room(User current_user,
                                        RoomList all_rooms,
                                        UserList users)
        possible event of PokerInterface. creates a new room and lets the requesting user join it
        Parameters:
        current_user - requesting user
        all_rooms - list of all rooms so the room can be added
        Returns:
        the id of the new room or the message that the user is already in a room

      • join_room

        private org.json.JSONObject join_room(org.json.JSONObject data,
                                      User current_user,
                                      RoomList all_rooms)
        possible event of PokerInterface. lets the requesting user join a room if it exists
        Parameters:
        data - the data so we can get "room_id"
        current_user - the requesting user
        all_rooms - list of all rooms so the room can be found by room_id
        Returns:
        the a jsonobject with the room id if the user is joined successful

      • leave_room

        private org.json.JSONObject leave_room(User user,
                                       RoomList all_rooms)
        possible event of PokerInterface. lets the requesting user leave a room if it exists
        Parameters:
        user - who wants to leave the room
        all_rooms - list of all rooms so the room can be found by room_id
        Returns:
        jsonobject with status 0 if successfull

      • send_message

        private org.json.JSONObject send_message(org.json.JSONObject data,
                                         RoomList all_rooms,
                                         UserList connected_users,
                                         User current_user)
        a possible request of PokerInterface push a notification to all players in a room if the user is not in a room the push notification will go to each logged in user.
        Parameters:
        data - contains the message to be sent.
        all_rooms - needed to get the room if the user is in a room.
        connected_users - a list of all logged in users
        current_user - the user who wants to send a message
        Returns:

      • start_round

        private org.json.JSONObject start_round(RoomList all_rooms,
                                        org.json.JSONObject data,
                                        User current_user)
        a possible request of PokerInterface this request starts a new round if there are more than 2 players in this game
        Parameters:
        all_rooms - a list of all rooms the get the room by its id
        data - contains the room_id
        current_user - the user who wants to start a round
        Returns:
        a jsonobject with status 0 if successfull else 1

      • logout_user

        private org.json.JSONObject logout_user(User user,
                                        RoomList all_rooms,
                                        UserList connected_users)
        a possible request of PokerInterface this request performs a logout out for the given user. For this purpose the user will be remove from the connected_user list, from the Userlist of the given room etc.
        Parameters:
        user - who wants to logout
        all_rooms - needed to get the room where the user is.
        connected_users - to remove the given user from this list
        Returns:
        a logout_user_respone json with status 0

      • logoutUser

        private void logoutUser(User user,
                        RoomList all_rooms,
                        UserList connected_users)

      • register_user

        private org.json.JSONObject register_user(org.json.JSONObject data)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                          javax.mail.MessagingException
        a possible request of PokerInterface perform a registration for a user. write its data into the database When succesfull it sends the user a mail with his username and password
        Parameters:
        data - containing all data needed for a registration (name, password, email)
        Returns:
        json with status 0 if correct else 1
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when insert fails
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when email not correct
        See Also:
        DatabaseConnection, Mailer.sendRegistrationMail(String, String, String, String)
